member.name: T:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.UserControlPlaceHolder
member.summary:
This class can be used to dynamically load and unload user controls to and from the page. All dynamically loaded user controls are automatically reloaded at postback.
If you want to apply events to dynamically loaded controls, you must do so in Page_Load.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.UserControlPlaceHolder.LoadViewState(System.Object)
member.summary: Override LoadViewState to makes sure that all dynamically loaded controls are properly reloaded after each postback.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.UserControlPlaceHolder.GetControl(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a control that has been added to the place holder.
member.param: The ID of the control to retrieve.
member.returns: The control instane; null if none could be found.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.UserControlPlaceHolder.GetControl``1(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a control that has been added to the place holder.
member.param: The ID of the control to retrieve.
member.returns: The control instane; null if none could be found.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.UserControlPlaceHolder.LoadControl(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Dynamically load any user control to the place holder. If the control is already added, it will not be loaded a second time.
member.param: The path to the user control source file.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.UserControlPlaceHolder.LoadControl``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Dynamically load any user control to the place holder. If the control is already added, it will not be loaded a second time.
member.param: The URL to the user control source file.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.UserControlPlaceHolder.UnloadControl(System.String)
member.summary: Unload a previously loaded user control.
member.param: The ID of the control to unload.

member.name: P:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.UserControlPlaceHolder.LoadedControls
member.summary: A comma-separated string with the IDs of the user controls that have been added to the place holder.

member.name: T:NExtra.WebForms.JavaScript
member.summary:
The JavaScript class defines certain scripts that can be used server-side. The Scripts are properly registered and can thus be used in asynchronous postbacks.
The class randomizes the script IDs, which means that scripts can be added several times without overwriting eachother.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.JavaScript.Alert(System.String)
member.summary: Alert a message in an alert box.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.JavaScript.Redirect(System.String)
member.summary: Redirect the client to a certain page.
member.param: The url to redirect the client to.

member.name: P:NExtra.WebForms.JavaScript.CurrentPage
member.summary: Get the currently executing page, if any.

member.summary: Override the base Render method.

member.name: P:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.NoTableCreateUserWizard.HtmlRemover
member.summary: The ICanRemoveHtml instance that will be used to remove the HTML code. If no instance is set, the control will automatically use a new HtmlRemover.

member.name: T:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.IFrame
member.summary: The IFrame class can be used to embed an iframe to the page. The class does not support auto scaling of the frame to fit the frame content, since it behaved incorrectly in IE. Also, adding HTML content to the iframe requires JavaScript.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.IFrame.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Override OnPreRender to add a Literal to the control collection.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.IFrame.AppendAttribute(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Append a double attribute, which is only appended if the value is greater than zero.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.IFrame.AppendAttribute(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Append a int? attribute, which is only appended if the value has a value.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.IFrame.AppendAttribute(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Append a string attribute, which is only appended if the value is not null or empty.

member.name: M:NExtra.WebForms.WebControls.IFrame.AppendScrollingAttribute(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Append a scrolling attribute, which is either "yes" or "no".

member.summary: Append an allowtransparency attribute.

member.summary: Get/set the HTML content to load into the iFrame, if any. This property is applied with JavaScript, unlike the Src Â¨property, which is applied directly within the markup.

member.summary: Get the css class for a ListViewDataItem instance.
